name: The Bookworm Way of Life
description:
A time-management typing game where you play as the unnamed bookworm protagonist who just moved out and started to live independently. Balance between your responsabilities as an adult and trying to reach the goal of your reading challenge.

Work and earn money for books and expenses, read and review books and if you decide to, take care of a cat.

You can choose between 100+ books from varying genres and remember, the most important part:

Read what you enjoy and take care of yourself.

Happy reading!

          Interact

       Move
